page.description: Retrieve open index tag names (from 1 to n) - if parameter ommitted, report ALL names.

argument.name: index
argument.description: Optional. Default = All. The number of the tag name that you wish to retrieve.

page.discussion: The .INDEX_NAME_GET() method returns the tag name of the N th index tag in the production index for the table referenced by the object pointer, . If Number is not specified, Alpha Anywhere returns a CR-LF delimited list of indexes.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script displays a list of tags in the current table.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim index[20] as C tbl = table.current() i = 1 count = 1 while tbl.index_name_get(i) <> "" 'Get name of index tag tag = tbl.index_name_get(i) 'Get pointer to tag ip = tbl.index_get(tag) 'Find out if it is an index or a query type = ip.type_get() 'If an index ... if type = 2 then index[count] = tag count = count + 1 end if i = i + 1 end while tag_select = ui_get_list_array("Choose an index tag", 1, "index") tbl.index_primary_put(tag_select)

section.description: The following script creates an array using a different technique.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() indexes = tbl.index_name_get() 'because no parameter is used 'Alpha Five returns a CR-LF list count = w_count(indexes,CRLF()) dim index_array[count] as C index_array.initialize(indexes)
